PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-11212000-07-270,  ,  ,  ,  SGC
PrecisEnactment of the CRIMINAL RECORDS REGULATIONS which specify the factors to be considered by the Solicitor General before disclosing the criminal record of a person who has been pardoned for sexual offences, place restrictions on the use of that information and summarize the information that must be contained in Consent to Search and Consent to Disclosure documents.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0303 Publication Date: 2000-08-16
